item.title: Inside Mandalay: BBC joins rescuers searching for earthquake dead in Myanmar
item.description: The BBCâ€™s Yogita Limaye is the first foreign journalist to enter the country since the disaster struck.

item.title: Judge permanently dismisses criminal case against NYC mayor
item.description: The decision comes nearly two months after the Trump administration first sought to drop the case against Eric Adams.

item.title: Inside Mandalay: BBC finds huge devastation and little help for Myanmar quake survivors
item.description: Yogita Limaye is the first foreign journalist to enter Myanmar since a huge earthquake hit the war-torn country.

item.title: Tesla sales plunge after Elon Musk backlash
item.description: The car maker's sales slide has been attributed to competition and controversy around its boss.

item.title: Myanmar military announces temporary ceasefire
item.description: It says the truce will be in effect from 2-22 April to speed up relief efforts after last week's deadly earthquake.
